backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Veil app defining data types (User, Post, Reaction, Comment, Flag, InviteCode), state maps, and shared functions for user registration, post creation, reactions, comments, flagging, and invite code management with access control and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (emotion-mode UI guidance text, tonal styling, safety footer, etc.) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the app including styling, hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Veil React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component setting up TanStack Router with all page routes, React Query client, ThemeProvider, and a global Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with tabbed navigation for managing public posts, users, invite codes, post history, signups, and flagged posts, plus seat usage and ESP-flagged user displays with clear-flag actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminFlaggedPost: Displays flagged posts grouped by post ID, showing report counts and flag reasons, with a confirmation dialog to permanently delete flagged posts via admin mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin panel for managing invite codes, supporting adding custom codes, generating random ones, copying signup links, and revoking unused or used codes.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Lists all posts (public and private) sorted by date with emotion badges and visibility labels, allowing admins to delete any post via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows an access-denied screen for non-admin authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignup.tsx: Admin form to register a new user account by auto-generating an invite code and submitting a pseudonym and region selection.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Accordion-based admin UI listing all users with controls to suspend/unsuspend accounts and change subscription status per user.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin component that allows searching for a user's posts by Principal ID and deleting individual posts, with sorted display and per-post error handling.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy) with color-coded classes.
frontend/src/components/EntryProtectionM: A non-dismissible dialog modal that displays a safe-space acknowledgment message, requiring the user to click 'I Understand' to proceed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying the current year, app tagline, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with logo, role-aware nav links (including admin), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-height flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single user post with emotion badge, visibility status, word count, and controls to delete or toggle public/private visibility with rate-limit error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to /login and shows a spinner while auth state is initializing.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Displays a public community post with emoji reactions, collapsible comments, and a flag-with-reason dialog, respecting ownership rules for interactions.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostWarnin: A non-dismissible dialog warning users that their post will be publicly visible, requiring explicit acknowledgment before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Alert banner shown when a user's subscription has expired, displaying region-specific renewal pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication state (isAuthenticated, role, userId) derived from Internet Identity and admin status, along with a logout function that clears cookies, query cache, and redirects to login.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile, admin checks, posts, seat info, registration, and reactions, each wired to the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including color tokens for emotions, status, and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users and renders the AdminDashboard component for users with the admin role.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Authenticated page that displays a chronological list of public posts using PublicPostCard components, with redirects for unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard page that displays emotion-selection buttons (Confess, Broke, Happy) for creating posts, redirects unauthenticated users to login, and shows a subscription banner if the user's subscription is expired.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with email/password form fields that triggers Internet Identity authentication via useInternetIdentity and navigates to the community feed on success.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Authenticated page that fetches and displays the current user's posts sorted by creation date, with empty-state and loading UI, and a button to navigate to post creation.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Post creation page allowing authenticated users to write and submit a post with a chosen emotion type and visibility, including rate-limit error handling and entry/public-post warning modals.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page that collects display name, email, password, region, and invite code, validates inputs, calls the backend register mutation, and handles errors like invalid/used invite codes and capacity limits.
frontend/src/utils/cookies.ts: Utility module for managing a client-side auth token cookie with set, get, and clear functions using Secure and SameSite=Strict attributes.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Helper functions for subscription status checks (active/grace), post/public creation permissions, regional pricing strings, and human-readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Provides word counting utilities with a minimum word count threshold (24), including helpers to check if text meets the minimum and whether a given emotion type requires it.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens for UI, emotion modes, and status states, plus animation, typography, and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Veil journaling app project, including architectural notes, existing features (emotion mode UI guidance and safety footer), and new feature requests.
